Name: Persian: The Great Lamp Heist
About the game: Can you steal the Sultan's magical lamp? Persian: The Great Lamp Heist is a charming platforming adventure full of secrets and collectibles, with all sorts of cool platforming mechanics - and a difficulty that will make grown men cry. Get ready for hours of platforming mayhem! Game Features: 41 action packed levels spread across a huge world map Fun and varied platforming action - there's something new around every corner! Secret exits and alternate paths Time attack! For the masochists: an unreasonably brutal hard mode
